about_the_game:
Rage of towers is a modern Realistic Tower defense game. Typically, you build towers on the path to destroy enemies before they reach the end, But what if you could take control of the tower by yourself and feel the battlefield.

Long Gameplay

the game has 45 levels with different atmosphere and paths and up to 25 waves that challenge the best towers defense players.


Modern Enemies

Enemies are military vehicles such as bikes, tanks, helicopters, convoys and... Also there are some enemies with special abilities like Speed Charge Movement, Healing Carriers which heal the enemies close to them and spawn smaller enemies that were inside of them after they have been destroyed. In addition, Disabling Towers with electric pulse and so much more!

Towers, Lots of Towers

In Rage Of Towers you need to choose which tower to build on the base and its very important to have a strategy for their layouts. You can build 7 types of towers and can upgrade them multiply times while every each of them has a unique system of aiming and shooting that you can literally feel like actually being in the battlefield when on MANUAL MODE!

Early Access Features

  • 23 Unique towers
  • 25 Unique Enemies
  • Campaign with 45 Levels
  • Enhanced AI
  • Action Mode (Manual Tower Controlling)
  • Realistic Gameplay and Navigation System
  • Dynamic Weather


With a wide selection of towers to place and upgrade and an array of complex strategic maps to test your defenses, even the most skilled Tower Defense players will meet a challenge in Rage Of towers.

Gameplay note

Developer's Recommended Configuration is expected to fully work from the start to the end. This includes all movements, menu, and key functions mapped to the controller.
